item.title: AI Isn’t Coming for Your Job—It’s Coming for Your Whole Org Chart
item.description: Here’s how to make yourself irreplaceable.

item.title: Taco Bell Went All In on AI Ordering. Here’s Why It Backed Off
item.description: Automating its drive-through windows and counters seemed like a slam dunk. Here are 5 things AI didn’t provide.

item.title: 3 Ways to Make Your AI Company Stand Out From the Crowd
item.description: The big players are dominating AI. To compete in a saturated marketplace, AI companies need to stand out. Here’s how they can do that.

item.title: Dreams Don’t Pay the Rent: What Panera’s Founder Taught Johnny’s Pork Roll
item.description: Panera founder Ron Shaich coaches Johnny Yarusi on risk, resilience, and building the “greatest breakfast sandwich in America.”

item.title: How Uber Will Expand Into Helicopter Trips in 2026
item.description: Following Joby Aviation’s acquisition of Blade earlier this summer, Uber will offer helicopters as an option, starting with airport routes.
